foxml:property.NAME: info:fedora/fedora-system:def/model#label
foxml:property.VALUE: Enter a one-line description of the object.

audit:record.audit:justification: Created with Admin GUI "New Object" command

dsCompositeModel.comment: This DS-COMPOSITE-MODEL datastream is included as a starting point to assist in the creation of a content model. The DS-COMPOSITE-MODEL should define the datastreams that are required for any objects conforming to this content model. For more information about content models, see: http://fedora-commons.org/confluence/x/dgBI. For examples of completed content model objects, see the demonstration objects included with your Fedora distribution, such as: demo:CMImage, demo:UVA_STD_IMAGE, demo:DualResImageCollection, demo:TEI_TO_PDFDOC, and demo:XML_TO_HTMLDOC. For more information about the demonstration objects, see: http://fedora-commons.org/confluence/x/AwFI.

foxml:datastreamVersion.LABEL: Dublin Core Record for this object

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Enter a one-line description of the object.

element.label: Identificazione
element.name: dis_item
element.description: Il nome che si intende attribuire alla risorsa digitale.

element.label: Numero sequenza
element.name: aud_sequence_number
element.description: Numero di sequenza identificativo della traccia audio.

element.label: Denominazione/Titolo della traccia audio
element.name: aud_nomenclature
element.description: Denominazione o titolo della traccia audio.

element.label: Note
element.name: aud_note
element.description: Eventuali annotazioni alla traccia audio.

element.label: Progetto
element.name: gen_stprog
element.description: Indicazione del progetto di digitalizzazione.

element.label: Collezione
element.name: gen_collection
element.description: Riferimento alla collezione di cui la risorsa digitale farà parte.

element.label: Agenzia
element.name: gen_agency
element.description: Agenzia responsabile del processo di digitalizzazione.

element.label: Completezza
element.name: gen_completeness
element.description: Completezza della digitalizzazione

element.label: Condizioni di accesso
element.name: gen_access_rights
element.description: condizioni di accesso all'oggetto descritto nella sezione BIB

element.label: Title/Caption/Tracks Name
element.name: bib_title
element.description: The name given to the resource

element.label: Creator/Photographer
element.name: bib_creator
element.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the content of the resource such as a person, organization or service.

element.label: Subject
element.name: bib_subject
element.description: Subject

element.label: Description
element.name: bib_description
element.description: Description of the Track

element.label: Publisher
element.name: bib_publisher
element.description: An entity, (including persons, organizations, or services), responsible for making the resource available.

element.label: Contributor
element.name: bib_contributor
element.description: An entity responsible for contributing to the content of the resource such as a person, organization or service.

element.label: Date
element.name: bib_date
element.description: Temporal scope of the content if known. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD (e.g. 1890,1910-10,or 2007-10-23)

element.label: Resource Type
element.name: bib_type
element.description: Genre of the content of the resource. Examples include: home page, novel, poem, working paper, technical report, essay, dictionary.

element.label: Source
element.name: bib_source
element.description: A reference to a resource from which the present resource is derived.

element.label: Identifier
element.name: bib_identifier
element.description: A unique reference to the resource; In this instance, the accession number or collection number.

element.label: Language
element.name: bib_language
element.description: The language of the intellectual content of the resource.

element.label: Relation
element.name: bib_relation
element.description: Reference to a related resource.

element.label: Rights Management
element.name: bib_rights
element.description: Information about intellectual property rights, copyright, and various property rights.

element.label: Proprietario
element.name: bib_library
element.description: Nome dell'istituzione proprietaria dell'oggetto analogico o di parte dell'oggetto analogico.

element.label: Inventario
element.name: bib_inventory_number
element.description: Numero di inventario attribuito all'oggetto analogico dall'istituzione che lo possiede.

element.label: Collocazione
element.name: bib_shelfmark
element.description: Numero di inventario attribuito all'oggetto analogico dall'istituzione che lo possiede.
